EmailTemplate.name: Deactivate Campaigns Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Campaign Deactivation Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello
Your Campaign {!Campaign.Name} - {!Campaign.CampaignNumber__c} is set to end on {!Campaign.EndDate}. Unless you change the End Date, it will be deactivated 180 days after the End Date.
Thank you,
Salesforce Administrator
